name: Elysium
startIntroPart1: Greetings Chancellor Wallace, your actions as our leader has led to a new golden age, and we have reached to the stars, eventually finding a planet unpolluted by the folly of old.
startIntroPart2: On this new world, our citizens call for your help. Will you lead us in to a second golden age and spread liberty to this new world, or falter in our new endeavor?
declaringWar: Your actions threaten our liberty as a nation, and you actions threatens the peace. You must be stopped at all costs!
attacked: It's unfortunate it had lead to this. May we see the end of this.
defeated: Why did you seek our destruction? Was it meant to be, or was it for the arrogant needs of your country?
introduction: Greetings, my name is Eric Wallace, chancellor of Elysium.
hateHello: What is it you seek now?!
tradeRequest: We have a proposition that you may be interested in.
uniqueName: Land of the Free, Home of the Brave
uniques: [+20]% Strength <for [All] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles> <when at war>
[+50]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all non-occupied cities] <when at war>
[-20]% Production when constructing [Building] buildings [in all non-occupied cities] <when at war>
